Meta.title: Better Breeding
Meta.author: zwa73
Meta.description:
这个mod提供了一个BepInEX配置文件 sosarciel.betterbreeding.cfg 允许你设置: 育种附魔强度上限(原版你只能在种子上获得+7的食物属性加值) 育种可以同时提升多个属性, 而非单个(原版有9个可培育属性, 若开启AllowAllAttributes则会有17个可培育属性) 每个育种进度的附魔强度(原版是1d6,而此选项会将其改为一个固定值,每1步长可以看作是1/10点食物属性,种子加值每提升一级都将会应用一次步长) 培育全部属性(原版仅能在种子上获取所有属性的潜力和一条特殊的魅力属性) 培育过程中多次获取新属性(原版在第一次获取培育食物属性后就只能在此之上提升食物属性等级) 育种上限计算使用全属性总和, 而非分别计算每一条(如果此项不为真, 种子最终都将变为全属性全满) 作物生长速度倍率 土壤肥沃度倍率 允许额外产卵 额外产卵的繁育值倍率 额外产卵的繁育值加值 产卵时产生受精卵的概率(此选项应该对非牧场产生的蛋也生效) 牲畜自动产肉 牲畜自动产肉的繁育值倍率 牲畜自动产肉的繁育值加值 自动产肉时产生雪花肉的概率
这个mod可以和 "EasyFarm" id=3358138188 一起使用
注意, 所有选项默认都不启用 你需要手动在游戏安装目录的BepInEX配置(如"SteamLibrary\steamapps\common\Elin\BepInEx\config\sosarciel.betterbreeding.cfg") 内更改配置使其生效
This mod provides a BepInEx configuration file, sosarciel.bettergenemodification.cfg, which allows you to set: Breeding enchantment strength limit (originally you can only get +7 food attribute bonus on seeds) Breeding can increase multiple attributes simultaneously instead of just one (in the original game, there are 9 attributes available for breeding, and 17 if AllowAllAttributes is enabled) Enchantment strength for each breeding step (originally 1d6, this option changes it to a fixed value; each step can be seen as 1/10 point of food attribute, applied each time the seed value increases) Breed all attributes (originally you can only get the potential for all attributes and one special charm attribute on seeds) Gain multiple new attributes during breeding (originally you can only increase the food attribute level once after acquiring the breeding food attribute for the first time) Use the total sum of all attributes for breeding limit calculation, instead of calculating each one separately (if this option is not enabled, the seeds will eventually have all attributes maximized) Crop growth rate multiplier Soil fertility multiplier Allows extra egg laying Breeding rate multiplier during extra egg laying Additional breeding value during extra egg laying Chance of producing fertilized eggs during egg laying (this option should also apply to eggs not produced in the ranch) Automatic meat production for livestock Breeding rate multiplier for automatic meat production in livestock Additional breeding value for automatic meat production in livestock Chance of producing marbled meat during automatic meat production
This mod can be used with "EasyFarm" (id=3358138188)
Note: All options are disabled by default You need to manually change the settings in the BepInEx configuration file located in the game installation directory (e.g., "SteamLibrary\steamapps\common\Elin\BepInEx\config\sosarciel.betterbreeding.cfg") to enable them
